name: CatFight!
description:
CatFight! is a simple 2D 2-player fighter game where you play as one of nature's most adorable creatures–– cats! Grab one friend and jet off into space with your trusty fish, avoiding asteroids to gain the most points by the end of 3 minutes. If you're an avid gamer, you can dare to try the bullet hell setting (or the easy mode, we won't judge).

This game was developed by Tyler Amano-Smerling and Dylan Appleton for Intermediate Game Design, with the help of Joe Hahnenfeld and Avik Chari (audio) and Atsi Carrington and Thomas Ling (usability). We hope you enjoy this bit of mindless fun!
